== !ProjectName.Operations Detail ===

 This project contains all the operational classes used to perform an operation in !SharePoint like adding an item, creating a list, installing a custom action.Below Class Diagram show the classes used in !ProjectName.Operations project.  <br>

http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Operations.Class.png


 Below is the description of classes shown in above class diagram

 1. <b>!InstallCustomAction</b> - This class is used to install all custom actions in !SharePoint. It is inheriting from !BaseOperation class
  
  Method <br>
  a. <b>!RegisterCustomCoreInScriptLink</b> - This method is used to register custom javascript file in Script Link<br>
  
<hr/>

 2. <b>!ListOperations</b> - This class is used to perform all list level operations in !SharePoint. It is inheriting from !BaseOperation class<br><br>
  
  Method <br>
  a. <b>!AddItem</b> - This method is used to create list item in list<br>
  b. <b>!CreateList</b> - This method is used to create list in Site<br>
  c. <b>!CreateSiteColumn</b> - This method is used to create site column in site<br>
  d. <b>DeleteItemByID</b> - This method is used to delete list item based on ID from the list<br>
  e. <b>!DeleteItemByTitle</b> -  This method is used to delete list item based on Title from the list<br>
  f. <b>!DeleteList</b> - This method is used to delete list from site<br>
  g. <b>!GetFileNameById</b> - This method is used get the file name from the ID<br>
  h. <b>GetListByListID</b> - This method is used to get the list based on the List ID<br>
  i. <b>!GetListByName</b> - This method is used to get the list based on the list name<br>
  j. <b>DeleteItemPermanentlyByID</b> - This method is used to delete the item permanently from the system. User will not be able to restore the item from the recycle bin<br>
  h. <b>GetContentTypeFieldsByContentTypeID</b> - This method will return collection of fields of content type based on the content type id<br>
  j. <b>GetListFieldsByListName</b> - This method will return the field collection for the specified list<br>
  k. <b>GetListItem</b> - This method will return the list item<br>
  l. <b>GetListItemByID</b> - This method will return the list item based on the list item id<br>
  m. <b>GetListURL</b> - This method will return the URL of the specified list<br>
  n. <b>GetSPFieldByName</b> - This method will return the sharepoint field based on the name of the field<br>
  o. <b>IsListExisting</b> - This method will return true or false whether list is exists or not in the specified web<br>
  p. <b>IsListItemExists</b> - This method will return true or false whether list item is exists or not in the specified list<br>
  q. <b>IsPageExists</b> - This method will return true or false whether the page is exists or not in the specified url<br>
  s. <b>PerformMinorCheckin</b> - This method will check-in the document or page in minor version<br>
